abstract: Software patents may be a mess. But Britain's James Dyson makes the case that strong patent protection is a vital tool of economic policy.
snippet: Software patents may be a mess. But Britain's James Dyson makes the case that strong patent protection is a vital tool of economic policy.
lead_paragraph: The recent news about patents has all been about big technology companies loading up on them and litigating, especially in the smartphone market.

headline.main: Another View of Patents From James Dyson
